abstract.li: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identifies an analysis along with its associated discipline, version, and status.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identifies an analysis along with its associated discipline, version, and status.

inscope.li: representation of the data that identify an analysis its associated discipline, version, and status.

outscope.li: representation of any use of an analysis.

ae.refpath: product_definition {product_definition product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation product_definition_formation.of_product -> product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name='Analysis'}
